methods.name: AddPage
methods.description: Convert the content of a layout to pdf file. with: the page width in PostScript (1/72th of an inch). height: the page height in PostScript (1/72th of an inch). Base directory to pdfName is: /mnt/sdcard/

methods.name: AddPage10
methods.description: Convert the content of a layout to pdf file. with: the page width in PostScript (1/72th of an inch). height: the page height in PostScript (1/72th of an inch). Base directory to pdfName is: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/

methods.name: CopyFromAsset
methods.description: Copy a file from asset to ASD. Return absolute path file.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Set a name pdf file to create.Base directory to pdfName is: /mnt/sdcard/

methods.name: Create10
methods.description: Set a name pdf file to create.Base directory to pdfName is: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/

methods.name: Density
methods.description: Density pixel Screen. Multiply Layout.with * Density Layout.height * Density

methods.name: Finish
methods.description: After adding the last page you must finalize the document using this block.

methods.name: Finish10
methods.description: After adding the last page you must finalize the document using this block.

methods.name: GetAsdPath
methods.description: Get App Specific Directory path (ASD). Example: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/

methods.name: ReadPdf
methods.description: Read pdf file, image is an Image component. First page is: 0.Base directory to pdfName is: /mnt/sdcard/

methods.name: ReadPdf10
methods.description: Read pdf file, image is an Image component. First page is: 0.Base directory to pdfName is: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/

blockProperties.name: PageCount
blockProperties.description: Gets the number of pages in the document. First page is: 0.

blockProperties.name: PageCount10
blockProperties.description: Gets the number of pages in the document. First page is: 0.

name: KIO4_Pdf
helpString: Convert content of a layout to Pdf file. Read pdf file in an image component. Juan Antonio Villalpando - KIO4.COM

events.name: AddedPage
events.description: When a page is added finishedPage is true.

events.name: AddedPage10
events.description: When a page is added finishedPage is true.
